attributes.additional_details:
With less chance, of confident preparation, towards the next level of their education, we owe it to our children, to give them, their most confident chance. This is why I feel it is important, not only for students but also for parents and teachers to be given the opportunity to allow them, to be secured an extra year of study within their current educational facility.
Knowing they have done all they can, aswell as feeling, we have done what we can (no matter what age/stage they were at before) to support their next steps into the future...
attributes.background:
During this COVID-19 pandemic everyone; including students have been left confused, anxious and pre-occupied.
Unable to meet the educational needs of children; from junior school levels right through to high school levels and beyond.
